body_html: @t-vi This interface is used by numba to create a pointer of the underlying data along with a a python-level reference to the owning object (the torch.Tensor in this case). Please correct me if I'm mistaken, but this should properly handle ownership/lifetime.
body_text: @t-vi This interface is used by numba to create a pointer of the underlying data along with a a python-level reference to the owning object (the torch.Tensor in this case). Please correct me if I'm mistaken, but this should properly handle ownership/lifetime.
body: @t-vi This interface is used by numba to create a pointer of the underlying data along with a a python-level reference to the owning object (the `torch.Tensor` in this case). Please correct me if I'm mistaken, but this should properly handle ownership/lifetime.
